description:
Shamiko visits a café rumored to be frequented by demons in search of clues about Sakura, but somehow ends up getting a part-time job instead!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: A New Species Discovered! The Town Cafe is a Demon Lair!
Shinshu Hakken! Machi no Kissa wa Mazoku no Soukutsu!
新種発見! 町の喫茶はまぞくの巣窟!
